module.name: composition_of_individual_product
module.keywords: application, module, composition, whole-part, individual, product, process plant

purpose.P: The Composition of individual product application module supports the requirement to record a whole-part relationship between individual products.
The nature of a whole-part relationship between individual products may be specified by indicating a class of composition of product of which it is a member.

example.P: The pump with serial number XYZ_1234 is an individual product. The impeller with serial number ABC_2345 is an individual product.
The relationship between pump with serial number XYZ_1234 and the impeller with serial number ABC_2345, that indicates the impeller is part of the pump, is a composition of individual product.
The feed water system S_1004 is an individual product. The pump with tag P_1004A within the feed water system is an individual product.
The relationship between the system S_1004 and the pump with tag P_1004A, that indicates the pump is part of the system, is a composition of individual product.

LI.P: a relationship between one individual product and another that indicates one is part of the other.

note.P: Class of composition of product is within the scope of the Class of composition of product application module.

LI.P: classification of a whole-part relationship between products;

uof.name: Composition_of_individual_product
uof.description: The Composition_of_individual_product UoF identifies a composition of individual product relationship and defines the individual products for the whole and part.
